"Revelations from the surgeon who tried to save JFK and

In the harrowing tradition of Precious Victims--an unforgettable true-

book_title: Blood Lust: Portrait of a Serial Sex Killer

Devoted husband, loving father, respected businessman, Dayton Leroy

To prevent a horrible tragedy that will forever alter the course of

"--BOOK JACKET. Here is the unforgettable classic of suspense by
